text: Carlos González Vallés S. J., popularly known as Father Vallés (4 November 1925 — 9 November 2020) was a Spanish-Indian Jesuit priest and author. He lived in India for fifty years. He wrote in Gujarati and on mathematics. He was born in Logroño, Spain. He wrote for the Indian newspaper Gujarat Samachar. He also wrote for Kumar. Vallés died on 9 November 2020 in Madrid, Spain at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian writers category:Jesuits Category:Spanish writers
title: Carlos G. Vallés
